s: November 23, 2024 - Maypo is an American brand of hot cereals. The original product was maple flavored oatmeal but there are now a variety of flavors sold under the Maypo brand name. It was originally manufactured by Maltex Co. and is now owned by Homestat Farm, Ltd.

Maypo Transformation 1953 - Maypo, one of the original flavored oatmeals, was developed by the Maltex Corporation, in Burlington, Vermont. Shortly thereafter, Heublein, Inc. purchased the Maltex Corporation.September 1956 - The highly successful Marky Maypo "I WANT MY MAYPO!" television campaign ...
